channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- AR3200

item.title: CVE-2017-15343|2024-08-05T19:50:16.526Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ar3200
item.description: Huawei AR3200 with software V200R006C10, V200R006C11, V200R007C00, V200R007C01, V200R007C02, V200R008C00, V200R008C10, V200R008C20, V200R008C30 has an integer overflow vulnerability. The software does not sufficiently validate certain field in SCTP messages, a remote unauthenticated attacker could send a crafted SCTP message to the device. Successful exploit could system reboot.

item.title: CVE-2017-15344|2024-08-05T19:50:16.686Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- ar3200
item.description: Huawei AR3200 with software V200R006C10, V200R006C11, V200R007C00, V200R007C01, V200R007C02, V200R008C00, V200R008C10, V200R008C20, V200R008C30 has an integer overflow vulnerability. The software does not sufficiently validate certain field in SCTP messages, a remote unauthenticated attacker could send a crafted SCTP message to the device. Successful exploit could cause system reboot.
